talents.name: CrystalArcanist
talents.label: Crystal Arcanist
talents.description: Mages have a chance to appear with a crystal. Merging this mage summons an Arcanist, which can reduce armor by 0.5% with its attacks. The Arcanist also has a 40% chain attack possibility.

talents.name: HighArcanist
talents.label: High Arcanist
talents.description: One mage is always an Arcanist. Mages might appear with crystals that charge the Arcanist. The Arcanist has a powerful area attack, and over time its damage can increase. However, its critical damage is reduced.

talents.name: CrystalConnection
talents.label: Crystal Connection
talents.description: Mages have an increased chance to appear with a crystal. For each mage with a crystal, the Arcanist's damage increases by 3%.

talents.name: Crystallization
talents.label: Crystallization
talents.description: Merging a mage spawns 2 crystals that have the mage's stats with additional Arcanist bonuses. These crystals last for 15 seconds and can explode on contact with monsters, dealing significant damage.

talents.name: LightningRod
talents.label: Lightning Rod
talents.description: Every 10 seconds, Arcanists charge their attacks, significantly increasing their critical chance. This also leaves behind damaging ball lightning.

talents.name: MagmaFlow
talents.label: Magma Flow
talents.description: Arcanists have a chance to spray magma on attacks. Afflicted monsters take increased periodic damage and are more susceptible to critical hits. This damage can stack multiple times.

talents.name: AbsorbEnergy
talents.label: Absorb Energy
talents.description: After defeating a boss, an Arcanist may absorb its energy to rank up. If no suitable Arcanists are present, a random mage will rank up. This talent offers no direct performance buffs.
